sentences.english: Their basic aim is to delight and instruct.
sentences.chinese: 這些畫的底子目標是給人娛悅和教誨。

sentences.english: All you have accomplished, honourable teacher, for my backward daughter!
sentences.chinese: 尊敬的老師，小女淺陋無知，承蒙您教誨。

sentences.english: Among the teachings of our professors, most important were those of university president Jiang Nanxiang.
sentences.chinese: 老師們的教誨，首先是蔣南翔校長的教誨。

sentences.english: Among the teachings of our professors, most important were those of university president Jiang Nanxiang.
sentences.chinese: 老師們的教誨，首先是蔣南翔校長的教誨。

sentences.english: Tibetan Buddhism also holds the notion that Precious Umbrella symbolizes the power of Buddha's edification.
sentences.chinese: 藏傳佛教亦認爲，寶傘象徵着佛陀教誨的權威。

sentences.english: His predecessor Bill Clinton did not escape "criticism from Confucius" either.
sentences.chinese: 他的前任克林頓也沒能逃脫來自孔子的“諄諄教誨”。

sentences.english: And yet that is only the beginning of his teaching.
sentences.chinese: 而這僅僅是他教誨的開始。

sentences.english: Your teachings urge me to the wind and rain, my heart till blessings with you day and night.
sentences.chinese: 您的教誨催我風雨兼程，我的祝福伴您晝夜心耕。

sentences.english: Master Shifu tries his best to train the panda into a real warrior according to Master Wugu's instruction.
sentences.chinese: 師傅謹遵烏龜的教誨，努力將熊貓培養成真正的武士。

sentences.english: Under His teaching every relationship becomes a lesson in love. T-20. V. 3
sentences.chinese: 依從他的教誨每一種關係都成了關於愛的課程。

sentences.english: You no longer hear the teachings, for me, really sorry.
sentences.chinese: 再也聽不到你的教誨，對我來說，真是遺憾。

sentences.english: On the other hand, Jinsheng teaches Zhaoyi a lesson after he learnt of her misdeed.
sentences.chinese: 另一方面，金生髮現昭儀的劣行後，馬上略加教誨。

sentences.english: He often inculcates in young people the duty of loyalty.
sentences.chinese: 他經常以忠貞之道諄諄教誨年輕人。

sentences.english: Because you teach, our worlds are filled with a riotous color.
sentences.chinese: 因爲您的教誨，我們的世界充滿繽紛色彩。

sentences.english: We failed to inculcate students with love of knowledge.
sentences.chinese: 我們未能通過諄諄教誨使學生們熱愛知識。

sentences.english: In addition, the progressivity of education fee dropped.
sentences.chinese: 另外，生均教誨費的累退性在低落。

definition: a sage/wise and holy man/virtuous ruler/Buddhist lama/wine
scholarship/high-level study/to do scholarly research/to pursue a high level of study
making an all-out effort (idiom); to try one's heart out/to do one's utmost
to come to understand/to realize/consciousness/awareness/Buddhist enlightenment (Sanskrit: cittotpāda)
